  image: milvusdb/milvus:v2.6.9

  image: milvusdb/milvus:v2.6.9

  image: milvusdb/milvus:v2.6.9

  container_name: milvus-indexcoord
  image: milvusdb/milvus:v2.6.9

  container_name: milvus-indexnode

datacoord:
  container_name: milvus-datacoord
  image: milvusdb/milvus:v2.6.9   
...
datanode:
  container_name: milvus-datanode
  image: milvusdb/milvus:v2.6.9
docker compose down
docker compose up -d
docker stop <milvus-component-docker-container-name>
# migration.yaml
cmd:
  # Option: run/backup/rollback
  type: run
  runWithBackup: true
config:
  sourceVersion: 2.1.4   # Specify your milvus version
  targetVersion: 2.6.9
  backupFilePath: /tmp/migration.bak
metastore:
  type: etcd
etcd:
  endpoints:
    - milvus-etcd:2379  # Use the etcd container name
  rootPath: by-dev # The root path where data is stored in etcd
  metaSubPath: meta
  kvSubPath: kv
# Suppose your docker-compose run with the default milvus network,
# and you put migration.yaml in the same directory with docker-compose.yaml.
docker run --rm -it --network milvus -v $(pwd)/migration.yaml:/milvus/configs/migration.yaml milvus/meta-migration:v2.2.0 /milvus/bin/meta-migration -config=/milvus/configs/migration.yaml
Update the milvus image tag in the docker-compose.yaml
docker compose down
docker compose up -d
headingContent: Upgrade Milvus Cluster with Docker Compose

anchorList.label: 使用 Docker Compose 升级 Milvus 群集
通过更改映像升级 Milvus
